text: Hello team, i am new in HubSpot CMS and i need to learn on it. I hope this is good place to learn. Now i am working on another WordPress cms as a Sr. Developer in ahmedabad.

Hi Laxman, a great place to get started with learning the HubSpot CMS is the discovery kit <https://designers.HubSpot.com/discoverykit>

There is a certification course included which even if you don’t need the certification, the course itself is free and well worth diving into.
I know this old, but yes HubSpot uses HubSpot for our own website, this also applies to our developer websites.

hey dudes :slightly_smiling_face:
another new dev here starting a HubSpot project. I’m from Melbourne, Australia :wave:
